structured.description: A man with a bald head and a full, reddish-brown beard is presented from the chest up, wearing professional business attire. He is smiling warmly at the viewer, set against a dark blue background adorned with a glowing digital network pattern. The overall presentation suggests a blend of professional competence and friendly accessibility.
structured.facial_features: Bald head, full reddish-brown beard, dark eyebrows.
structured.expression: A warm, open-mouthed smile with visible white teeth.
structured.attire: Black suit jacket, white collared shirt, and a light blue patterned necktie.
structured.palette: Dominant colours include dark blue, black, white, light blue, and reddish-brown, with bright white glowing elements in the background. The lighting is bright and even on the subject's face.
structured.background: A dark blue background featuring a glowing, interconnected network pattern composed of white lines and dots.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
